original_text:
Fortune Coin
Una famosa slot machine viene presa dal piano del casinò e portata direttamente al computer o al dispositivo mobile. La slot Fortune Coin è uno dei giochi di jackpot più conosciuti di IGT, quindi è naturale che molti giocatori siano desiderosi di averla a disposizione.
Fortune Coin offre tre file e cinque rulli che girano in 243 modi per pagare. I payout sono fatti su bobine consecutive per tre o più simboli corrispondenti e ci possono essere più di un payout di simboli corrispondenti risultanti da un singolo giro.

Il tema di questo gioco di slot appartiene ovviamente al regno dell’Asia Orientale/Antica Cina. I simboli d’oro mettono in buona luce il luccichio di questo colore, in quanto ci sono i simboli di monete i cui valori vengono sommati per ognuno di essi che appare sul set di oscillazioni.
Oltre ai quattro premi del jackpot in gioco, i cui importi sono relativi alla scommessa scatenante, Fortune Coin ha anche un bonus gratuito per le rotazioni.

Una grafica ispirata alle tradizioni cinesi
I giocatori esperti sanno riconoscere un gioco di slot ben fatto che offre una promettente possibilità di vincere una grande vincita. La versione delle slot non si discosta troppo dall’originale. Salvo qualche dettaglio nel posizionamento delle varie parti del reel-set, la slot Fortune Coin è una replica della slot machine con cassa da gioco. Questo significa che tutti gli eventi delle grandi vincite sono lì per raccontarlo al mondo.
Quando il gioco bonus viene attivato (il bonus che potrebbe portare al jackpot progressivo in-game) il drago d’oro di buon auspicio vola sullo schermo per augurarvi buona fortuna. Anche le monete sullo schermo si illuminano, girano in posizione e sparano verso la parte superiore dello schermo per fondersi con la somma simultanea della vincita.
Nel frattempo, quelli di voi che scelgono di giocare con il suono acceso potranno ascoltare tutta la gloria di una partitura musicale e una serie di effetti sonori che rendono l’esperienza di gioco simile a quella di Las Vegas.

Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Un bonus di giri gratis viene fornito con tre o più spargimenti che cadono sui rulli. Il bonus può essere recuperato con lo stesso numero di scatter. Il bonus del jackpot inizia quando un certo numero di monete d’oro si ferma sui rulli. Questo fa scattare un gioco di bonus, dove uno schermo riempito con i simboli delle monete risulta in un gioco pick-me. Nella slot Fortune Coin, i giocatori possono scegliere da un’altra serie di monete. Se ne vengono abbinate tre per il premio del jackpot corrispondente, il jackpot viene assegnato.
Il simbolo più prezioso sono i tre draghi d’oro, del valore di 40x sulla linea della moneta vincente. La rana d’oro vale 35x, il pesce d’oro paga 30x e le due reliquie d’oro pagano 25x e 20x.
Ogni volta che c’è una pila dello stesso simbolo su un’oscillazione che l’oscillazione può trasformarsi in qualsiasi simbolo e sincronizzarsi con un’altra oscillazione o oscillazioni per creare due o più oscillazioni impilate con un simbolo corrispondente.
La Caratteristica di Moneta di Fortuna è attivata quando sei o più monete d’oro si fermano sulle oscillazioni. Il giocatore è portato a un gioco di gratifica dove solo le monete e i simboli di primo premio possono fermarsi sulle oscillazioni.

Domande Frequenti 
Quanto spesso paga la slot Fortune Coin?

Dalla nostra ricerca con questo gioco, abbiamo scoperto che in media, i giocatori troveranno combo vincenti ogni 10 giri circa e di solito, non dovranno aspettare più di 20 round per abbinare una combinazione vincente.



Quanto è volatile Fortune Coin? 

Questo gioco fa parte di quelle slot online con varianza bassa/media, il che significa che ci sono molte ricompense frequenti con valori differenti. A volte devi attendere tra una vincita e l'altra, ma di solito non dovrai aspettare molto.



Posso giocare alla slot online Fortune Coin su dispositivi mobili?

Certo, perché si tratta di una slot HTML5, il che significa che puoi giocarci su qualsiasi dispositivo con un browser web e una connessione Internet di buona qualità.

raw_translation.response:
Fortune Coin

A renowned slot machine has been taken from the casino floor and brought directly to your computer or mobile device. Fortune Coin is one of IGT's most well-known jackpot games, so it's only natural that many players are eager to play it.

Fortune Coin offers three rows and five reels that spin in 243 ways to pay. Payouts are made on consecutive reels for three or more matching symbols, and there can be multiple payouts of matching symbols resulting from a single spin.

The theme of this slot game belongs to the realm of East Asia/Ancient China. The golden symbols add to the glitz of this color, as there are coin symbols whose values are added for each one that appears on the reel set.

Aside from the four in-game jackpot prizes, whose amounts are relative to the triggering bet, Fortune Coin also has a free bonus for spins.

A graphics inspired by Chinese Traditions

Experienced players can recognize a well-made slot game that offers a promising chance of winning a big payout. The slot version does not deviate too much from the original. Except for some details on the positioning of various parts of the reel set, Fortune Coin is a replica of the game cabinet slot machine. This means that all the events of big wins are there to tell the world.

When the bonus game is activated (the bonus that could lead to the progressive jackpot in-game), the auspicious golden dragon flies onto the screen to wish you good luck. Even the coins on the screen light up, spin into position, and shoot upward toward the top of the screen to merge with the simultaneous sum of the win.

In the meantime, those of you who choose to play with the sound on will be able to hear all the glory of a musical score and a series of sound effects that make the gaming experience similar to that of Las Vegas.

Functions, and symbols of the Slot Machine

A free spins bonus is provided with three or more scatters falling on the reels. The bonus can be redeemed with the same number of scatters. The jackpot bonus begins when a certain number of gold coins stops on the reels. This triggers a bonus game, where a screen filled with coin symbols results in a pick-me game. In the Fortune Coin slot, players can choose from another set of coins. If three are matched for the corresponding jackpot prize, the jackpot is awarded.

The most valuable symbol is the three golden dragons, with a value of 40x on the winning coin line. The golden frog is worth 35x, the golden fish pays 30x, and the two golden relics pay 25x and 20x.

Whenever there is a stack of the same symbol on one reel, the reel can transform into any symbol and sync with another reel or reels to create two or more stacked reels with a matching symbol.

The Fortune Coin feature is activated when six or more gold coins stop on the reels. The player is taken to a gratification game where only the coins and top prize symbols can land on the reels.

FAQs

How often does Fortune Coin slot pay out?

From our research with this game, we found that on average, players will find winning combinations every 10 spins or so, and usually, they won't have to wait more than 20 rounds to match a winning combination.

How volatile is Fortune Coin?

This game is part of those low/medium variance online slots, which means that there are many frequent rewards with different values. Sometimes you have to wait between one win and the next, but usually, you won't have to wait long.

Can I play Fortune Coin slot online on mobile devices?

Of course, because it's an HTML5 slot, which means you can play it on any device with a web browser and a good quality internet connection.

response.headline: Bonus Features
response.content:
What's the point of playing a slot game without some exciting bonuses to spice things up? Luckily, Fortune Coin has you covered with some great bonus features that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

First up, we have the free spins bonus which is triggered by landing three or more scatter symbols. Not only do you get to spin for free, but all of your wins during this bonus round are multiplied - talk about a lucky break! Just make sure you're not too dizzy from all the spinning.

Forget digging for gold, in Fortune Coin you can win big by collecting gold coins on the reels. Collecting a certain number of them triggers a pick-me game that could lead you to one of four possible jackpots. Fingers crossed you'll hit the big one and change your life forever!

And last but not least, we have the Fortune Coin feature which is activated when six or more gold coins appear on the reels. This feature takes you to a gratification game, where you get to win even more coins to add to your growing fortune. Who knew coins could be so much fun?

All in all, Fortune Coin is a slot game with a lot of tricks up its sleeve. Make sure you keep your eyes peeled for those gold coins and scatters, you never know what exciting bonus feature could be just around the corner!

But don't just sit there waiting for Lady Luck to come knocking at your door - you have to earn it! Each jackpot prize is tied to a certain amount of coins matched in the pick-me game. response.headline: Symbol Values
response.content:
Let's talk about what really matters in this review of Fortune Coin - symbol values. The game has a lot of symbols to keep track of, but fear not, we'll guide you through it.

The golden dragons are the equivalent of a treasure trove in this game. With a value of 40x on the winning coin line, it's worth going to great lengths just to see it appear on your screen. And if you're the kind of punter that gets lucky twice, the golden frog is worth 35x, just in case you were wondering.

The golden fish is no Nemo, with a payout of 30x, and the two golden relics pay a respectable 25x and 20x, respectively. And if you're lucky enough to score a stack of the same symbol on one reel, the game will transform it into any symbol and sync with another reel or reels to create two or more stacked reels with a matching symbol. Cue the Miley Cyrus because that's called best of both worlds.

Overall, the symbol values in Fortune Coin are pretty standard but the game makes up for it with its gameplay and bonuses. You'll definitely get that adrenaline rush while playing it, even if it's just from seeing a stack of three dragons land on your screen.

Review:
 
Gameplay

Fortune Coin is a slot game with three rows and five reels that spin in 243 ways to pay. Payouts are made on consecutive reels for three or more matching symbols, and there can be multiple payouts of matching symbols resulting from a single spin.

Jackpot Prizes

Fortune Coin has four in-game jackpot prizes, whose amounts are relative to the triggering bet. Additionally, there is a free bonus for spins.

Bonus Features

A free spins bonus is provided with three or more scatters falling on the reels. The bonus can be redeemed with the same number of scatters. The jackpot bonus begins when a certain number of gold coins stops on the reels. This triggers a bonus game, where a screen filled with coin symbols results in a pick-me game. Players can choose from another set of coins. If three are matched for the corresponding jackpot prize, the jackpot is awarded. The Fortune Coin feature is activated when six or more gold coins stop on the reels. The player is taken to a gratification game where only the coins and top prize symbols can land on the reels.

Graphics and Sound Effects

The theme of Fortune Coin belongs to the realm of East Asia/Ancient China. The graphics are inspired by Chinese traditions and the symbols add to the glitz of this color scheme. The game has a musical score and a series of sound effects that make the gaming experience similar to that of Las Vegas.

Symbol Values

The most valuable symbol is the three golden dragons, with a value of 40x on the winning coin line. The golden frog is worth 35x, the golden fish pays 30x, and the two golden relics pay 25x and 20x. Whenever there is a stack of the same symbol on one reel, the reel can transform into any symbol and sync with another reel or reels to create two or more stacked reels with a matching symbol.

Variance

From our research with this game, we found that it is a low/medium variance online slot. Players will find winning combinations every 10 spins or so, and usually, they won't have to wait more than 20 rounds to match a winning combination.
